Authors:
Ifeloju Dayo-Owoyemi, Andre Rodrigues, Melissa Fontes
Landell, Patricia Valente, Ulrich G. Mueller, Jesus Pais Ramos, Fernando
C Pagnocca
Title:
Intraspecific variation and emendation of Hannaella
kunmingensis (Bai, Takashima & Nakase) Bai & Wang, 2008
Abstract:
Using a polyphasic approach of species identification, we
show the morphological, physiological and genetic variation within 11
isolates of the basidiomycetous yeast Hannaella kunmingensis.
Differences in colony morphology, in assimilation of vitamin free,
xylitol, L-arabinitol, nitrite and in phylogenetic and parsimony network
analyses of three DNA regions were highlighted in H. kunmingensis. To
accommodate such intraspecific variations, an emendation of the species
diagnose is proposed.
